title: Voice Command Health Data Retrieval – Alerts and Notifications for Health Anomalies
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to use voice commands to retrieve health data and receive alerts for anomalies so that I can efficiently monitor my patients' health status and respond promptly to any concerns.

title: Contextual Caregiver Alerts – Voice Alerts for Critical Health Changes
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive voice alerts for critical health changes in my patients so that I can respond promptly and provide necessary interventions, even when I am not physically present with them.

title: Health Monitoring and Communication
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to efficiently monitor my patients' health status and communicate with them asynchronously so that I can provide timely interventions and maintain a connection without interrupting their routines.

title: Voice-Activated Communication Preferences
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to set voice-activated communication preferences so that I can efficiently interact with the ALFRED system and maintain connection with my patients without interrupting my care routines.

title: Health Insight Dialogue System – Conversational Updates on Health Trends
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive conversational updates on my patients' health trends so that I can track their progression efficiently and identify any early warning signs without interrupting my care routines.

title: Direct Voice Messaging for Care Coordination
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to send and receive quick voice messages to coordinate care with my patients and their families, so that I can maintain effective communication without interrupting my patient care routines.

title: Voice Summaries of Recent Health Data
summary: As a home-care nurse, I want to receive voice summaries of my patients' recent health data so that I can efficiently monitor their health status and identify any early warning signs without interrupting my care routines.
